name: Snow Cube
description:
Find what's has been hidden in the snow cube.

If the Mysterious Cube has more than 4 sides exposed, then you win.

You have limited flints to start a fire on any EMPTY spot. 

Click on Fire Icon to use it, then select the empty spot to start the fire.

Click on mini map to rotate the cube.

Using left mouse button to move cube around. There are four types cube.

SNOW: can be moved around and destroyed by bomb.

STONE: CAN'T be moved, and will turn to snow cube if it has been bomb.

BOMB: Fire will explode the bomb, and destroy all the cubes around.

Difficult may change some conditions.
